resources.string: Loans Manager: Don\'t lose your stuff anymore!
Do you confirm that the object is back?
Enter the name of the product
(Not required) Enter additional information about the product
Enter the name of the borrower
Looking for the title on the internet
You are going to be redirected towards the market to download a barcode scanner. Do you agree ?
